original: bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas //
analyzed: bdag gis su ni bcing bar bya // zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas //
translated: Whom shall I bind?

original: smin drug la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams bcing ba'o //
analyzed: smin drug la sogs pa'i rgyu skar rnams bcing ba'o //
translated: This means binding the lunar mansions such as Magha with the noose of the curse of the knowledge mantra.

original: gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing //
analyzed: gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing //
translated: Those who are hostile

original: 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed //🔽ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu zhing //
analyzed: 'jig rten la ni phan mi byed // ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu zhing //
translated: and do not benefit the world,

original: gnod pa skyel ba rnams la rig sngags kyi bcing ba lngas bcings pa'o //
analyzed: gnod pa skyel ba rnams la rig sngags kyi bcing ba lngas bcings pa'o //
translated: This means binding with the five bonds of the knowledge mantra those who wander in the trichiliocosm and bring harm.

original: de dag la ni thams cad du //
analyzed: de dag la ni thams cad du //
translated: To them, everywhere

original: @32b phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: @32b phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o //
translated: the directions should not be shown.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This means

original: gnod pa skyel ba'i 'byung po rnams /
analyzed: gnod pa skyel ba'i 'byung po rnams /
translated: that the evil spirits who bring harm

original: phyogs bcu rnams su gnas pa'i sa med par //
analyzed: phyogs bcu rnams su gnas pa'i sa med par //
translated: have no place to stay in the ten directions

original: sdug bsngal drag po myong ba'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal drag po myong ba'o //
translated: and experience intense suffering.

original: 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de //
analyzed: 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de //
translated: The world with its gods

original: 'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de //
translated: condemns the evil spirits.

original: zhes bya ba ni lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa /
translated: This means that the gods, nagas, asuras, and so forth

original: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po rnams /
analyzed: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po rnams /
translated: The eighty-four thousand types of obstacles

original: phyir 'gyed cing 'dor mi gtong ba'o //🔽'byung po mi yi skye dgu la //
analyzed: phyir 'gyed cing 'dor mi gtong ba'o // 'byung po mi yi skye dgu la //
translated: do not cast them off or reject them.🔽They harm and injure

original: gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed //
analyzed: gnod par byed cing 'tshe bar byed //
translated: the human beings and other living creatures.

original: ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phung po lnga'i rang bzhin /
translated: This is the harm to the nature of the five aggregates

original: byang chub sems la gnod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems la gnod pa'o //
translated: and to the mind of awakening.🔽Those who transgress the mantras, medicines,

original: gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa //
analyzed: gang dag sngags dang sman rnams dang // rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa //
translated: and the activities of the knowledge mantras,

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di la gus par byed cing dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed ces rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di la gus par byed cing dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed ces rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa rnams so //
translated: are those who disrespect this [practice] and harm sentient beings who go for refuge to the Three Jewels, transgressing the words of the knowledge mantras.

original: 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni //
analyzed: 'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni //
translated: Here, the supreme mantra

original: pha rol gnon pa ston par byed //
analyzed: pha rol gnon pa ston par byed //
translated: teaches the practice of the other shore.

original: ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'dis kyang /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'dis kyang /
translated: This queen of knowledge mantras, Destroyer of the Great Trichiliocosm,

original: gsang sngags kyi tshig ston pa tsam gyis ni /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshig ston pa tsam gyis ni /
translated: merely teaches the words of the secret mantra.

original: ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyi stobs 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyi stobs 'phrog pa'o //
translated: The strength is taken away from the evil spirits.

original: rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor //
analyzed: rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor //

original: kun du chad pas bsdigs byas te //
analyzed: kun du chad pas bsdigs byas te //
translated: is threatened with a complete severance.

original: zhes pa ni phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ston pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ston pa ni /

original: ded dpon dag ni nyi shu brgyad //
analyzed: ded dpon dag ni nyi shu brgyad //

original: re re la yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: re re la yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o //
translated: and each has eighty thousand.

original: 'di dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni /
analyzed: 'di dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni /

original: dkar po dmar po ser po dang // ljang gu dang ni mthing ga dang // la la dkar ser dmar ser dang // la la ser nag ljang nag dang // mgo bo ser po mjug ma nag / smad dkar stod gnag khra po'i gzugs //
analyzed: dkar po dmar po ser po dang // ljang gu dang ni mthing ga dang // la la dkar ser dmar ser dang // la la ser nag ljang nag dang // mgo bo ser po mjug ma nag / smad dkar stod gnag khra po'i gzugs //
translated: yellow head, black tail,🔽white lower body, black upper body, variegated form,

original: sna tshogs gzugs te phyed gzugs so //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs te phyed gzugs so //
translated: various forms, half-form.

original: lag na rdo rje 'khor lo thogs //
analyzed: lag na rdo rje 'khor lo thogs //

analyzed: gtun shing dang ni rtse gsum mo // la la ral gri lag na thogs //

analyzed: gtor ma rva dang mdung thung thogs //

analyzed: 'phang mdung dang ni nar tsa dang // la la dbyug pa thogs pa dang // rtse gcig dang ni mdung rings thogs //

analyzed: mdung dang mda' gzhu lcags kyu dang // la la mda' rings ga ge dang // cha lang dang ni rol mo'i tshogs //

analyzed: pi wang gling bu glu len cing //

original: gnod sbyin pho mo glu len cing //
analyzed: gnod sbyin pho mo glu len cing //

analyzed: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yis//

analyzed: la la mi yi rus pa thogs //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' //

analyzed: rig sngags kyi bden pa'i dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o //

original: tshangs pas sbrul pa'i mdo sde ste //
analyzed: tshangs pas sbrul pa'i mdo sde ste //
translated: the abode of the rākṣasas is the city of the rākṣasas,🔽the abode of the piśācas is the city of the piśācas,

analyzed: sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo // zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas gnas pa /

original: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa /
translated: the abode of the pūtanas is the city of the pūtanas,🔽the abode of the ḍākinīs is the city of the ḍākinīs,🔽the abode of the kaṭapūtanas is the city of the kaṭapūtanas,🔽the abode of the unmadas is the

original: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: Homage to the Buddha Shakyamuni.

original: phan tshun du ni bltas byas na //
analyzed: phan tshun du ni bltas byas na //
translated: Having looked at each other,🔽The lapis lazuli, gold, and silver,

original: bee d'urya dang gser dngul dang // zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi gzhal yas khang lta na sdug cing rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: bee d'urya dang gser dngul dang // zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi gzhal yas khang lta na sdug cing rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: means that the celestial mansion of the beings is beautiful to behold and adorned with various jewels.🔽The pearls, crystals,🔽cat's eyes, and heart of stone,

original: mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // spug dang rdo yi snying po dang // zhes bya ba ni mu tig dmar po dkar pos dra ba byas pa /
analyzed: mu tig rnams dang shel dag dang // spug dang rdo yi snying po dang // zhes bya ba ni mu tig dmar po dkar pos dra ba byas pa /
translated: means that the red and white pearls form a net,

original: sa gzhi dang rtsig pa shel las byas pa /
analyzed: sa gzhi dang rtsig pa shel las byas pa /
translated: the ground and walls are made of crystal,

original: spug dang rdo'i snying pos ka tan dang / ka ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: spug dang rdo'i snying pos ka tan dang / ka ba byas pa'o //
translated: and the pillars and beams are made of cat's eyes and heart of stone.

original: rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: rin chen bdun gyis brgyan pa yi //
translated: Adorned with the seven precious substances,

original: rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i //
analyzed: rtsibs stong kha dog gser 'dra ba'i //
translated: The thousand-spoked wheel, the color of gold,

original: zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad /
translated: means that there are four gates and eight pillars,

original: tva ra rnam bzhi ni gzhi gser las byas pa /
analyzed: tva ra rnam bzhi ni gzhi gser las byas pa /
translated: the four tva-ras are made of gold,

original: rin po che sna bdun gyis phra byas pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che sna bdun gyis phra byas pa'o //
translated: and the seven precious substances form the decorations.

original: shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa //
analyzed: shing rta rnam pa bzhi byas pa //
translated: The four types of chariots are made,

original: bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: bzo rnams kun dang ldan pa ste //
translated: and is endowed with all the arts.

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is the meaning.🔽In the east, the lion-chariot,

original: shar phyogs seng ge'i shing rta dang // tva ra rnam bzhis mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: shar phyogs seng ge'i shing rta dang // tva ra rnam bzhis mdzes pa'o //
translated: and the four tāla trees make it beautiful.

original: de bzhin du go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du go rims bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply this in the same order.

original: glang po che dang / rta dang / ri dags sha rtu la'o //
analyzed: glang po che dang / rta dang / ri dags sha rtu la'o //
translated: The elephant, horse, and deer are the vehicles.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro //
translated: By means of magical power, one travels through the sky.

original: rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas //
analyzed: rgyal po dag ni der bzhugs nas //
translated: The king resides there.

original: zhes bya ba ni yang na shing rta de dang ldan zhing ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yang na shing rta de dang ldan zhing ;
translated: Or, endowed with that chariot,

original: / nam mkha' la rgyu'o //
analyzed: / nam mkha' la rgyu'o //
translated: one travels through the sky.

original: 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dod //
analyzed: 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor nyid du dod //
translated: The mandala of beings is arranged.

original: sa ni gser gyi phye ma la //
analyzed: sa ni gser gyi phye ma la //
translated: The earth is made of gold dust.

original: zhes bya ba ni sems kyis sprul pa'i gzhal yas khang dang 'dra ba //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems kyis sprul pa'i gzhal yas khang dang 'dra ba //
translated: Like the celestial mansion emanated by the mind,

original: lta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang pa'o //🔽me tog dag gis bkang byas nas //
analyzed: lta na sdug pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang pa'o // me tog dag gis bkang byas nas //
translated: it appears in various forms that are pleasing to behold.🔽Having filled it with flowers,🔽with garlands and strings,

original: mgul par ltung dang skud pa dang // zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi yang me tog gis bkang pa /
analyzed: mgul par ltung dang skud pa dang // zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi yang me tog gis bkang pa /
translated: the ground is also filled with flowers.

original: pho brang yang me tog gis snang ba ste /
analyzed: pho brang yang me tog gis snang ba ste /
translated: The palace is also filled with flowers.

original: 'byung po dang 'byung mo rnams me tog gis mgo la brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: 'byung po dang 'byung mo rnams me tog gis mgo la brgyan pa ste //
translated: The male and female spirits are adorned with flowers on their heads.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod pa'o //
translated: They enjoy the five sense pleasures.

original: zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la //
analyzed: zhags pa dag kyang gdags byos la //
translated: You should also cast out the nooses🔽and summon all the spirits

original: phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pas//
analyzed: phyogs kyi sa ni ji snyed pas//
translated: in all the lands in the ten directions.

original: @34b zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyang tshangs pa'i thag pas bcings te /
analyzed: @34b zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyang tshangs pa'i thag pas bcings te /
translated: The spirits are bound with the ropes of Brahmā.

original: sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba rnams la'o //🔽'byung po thams cad khrid shog ces //
analyzed: sa dang bar snang la rgyu ba rnams la'o // 'byung po thams cad khrid shog ces //
translated: They move on the earth and in the sky.🔽You should summon all the spirits

original: gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon kun //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon kun // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and all the yakṣa leaders.

original: gnod pa byed pa'i 'byung po rnams //
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa'i 'byung po rnams //
translated: The spirits who cause harm

original: kun kyang zhags pas drangs pa'o //🔽phyogs bcu dag tu dgye bar bya //
analyzed: kun kyang zhags pas drangs pa'o // phyogs bcu dag tu dgye bar bya //
translated: are all drawn out with nooses.🔽You should cast them out in the ten directions.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcun gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'byung po rnams dgye ba'o //🔽stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcun gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'byung po rnams dgye ba'o // stong chen rab tu 'joms pa yi //
translated: The spirits who live in the trichiliocosm in the ten directions are cast out.

original: mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di //
analyzed: mdo sde yi ni dam pa 'di //
translated: This excellent sūtra, the Destroyer of the Great Trichiliocosm,

original: zhes bya ba ni seng ge'i sgra lta bus dam pa rnams kyi dam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni seng ge'i sgra lta bus dam pa rnams kyi dam pa'o //
translated: This is the best of the best, like the lion's roar.

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du 'byung //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar du 'byung //
translated: Up to the Brahma world,

original: lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams //
analyzed: lha rnams kun gyis rnam par bsams //
translated: all the gods think of it.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos sku'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin thams cad khyab pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos sku'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin thams cad khyab pa /
translated: This is the nature of the Dharma body, pervading all like the nature of space.

original: sems can rnams kyi yum lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi yum lta bu'o //
translated: It is like a mother to sentient beings.

original: stong chen mo yi lus kyis su //
analyzed: stong chen mo yi lus kyis su //
translated: With a body of the great thousand,

original: gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul //
analyzed: gnod sbyin dang ni srin po btul //
translated: he subdued the yakshas and rakshasas.

original: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyis kyang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyis lus ngag yid gsum gyis kyang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'o //
translated: This is subduing all the wicked with the body, speech, and mind of the knowledge mantra.

original: lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas //
analyzed: lus ngan po yi tshig thos nas //
translated: Hearing the words of Kubera,

original: gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon stong //
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi ni ded dpon stong //
translated: the leader of the yakshas,

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po ku be ra'i tshig thos nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po ku be ra'i tshig thos nas /
translated: Hearing the words of the great king Kubera,

original: gnod sbyin ded dpon stong phrag gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnod sbyin ded dpon stong phrag gnas pa'o //
translated: the yaksha leaders dwell in thousands.

original: phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi dag tu song nas su //
translated: Going to the four directions,

original: gsad ba po la drag tu bsgo //
analyzed: gsad ba po la drag tu bsgo //
translated: they fiercely curse the killers.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de rnams kyang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin de rnams kyang /
translated: Those yakshas,

original: bka' stsal pa'i tshig snang ba'o //
analyzed: bka' stsal pa'i tshig snang ba'o //
translated: The words spoken are the light.

original: thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //
analyzed: thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //
translated: The Sage, the twenty-eight beings,

original: dri za las byung gdon gyi tshogs //
analyzed: dri za las byung gdon gyi tshogs //
translated: the host of spirits arisen from the gandharvas,

original: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa'o //
translated: The Sage is the Buddha.

original: dri za'i ded dpon gyi gdon phyogs der 'khod pa dag go//
analyzed: dri za'i ded dpon gyi gdon phyogs der 'khod pa dag go//
translated: The spirits are the spirits of the leader of the gandharvas who are assembled in that direction.🔽Those assembled in the eastern direction, all of them

original: shar phyogs cha na 'khod pa dag / mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun //
analyzed: shar phyogs cha na 'khod pa dag / mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun //
translated: with the sūtra noose,

original: zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs nas gnod par byed pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs nas gnod par byed pa /
translated: The harm-doers from the east

original: rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o //
translated: are bound by the noose of the curse of the knowledge mantra.

original: bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yis //
analyzed: bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yis //
translated: Bound by the five bonds,

original: 'byung po mang po nga la nyon //
analyzed: 'byung po mang po nga la nyon //
translated: the many spirits listen to me.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i zhags pas bsdams pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i zhags pas bsdams pa ste /
translated: The five bonds are the bonds of the five wisdoms.

original: dri za'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rnams /
analyzed: dri za'i gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rnams /
translated: The eighty thousand spirits of the gandharvas

original: rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: are the words spoken by the great king Dhṛtarāṣṭra.

original: thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //
analyzed: thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //
translated: The Sage, the twenty-eight beings,

original: grul bum las byung gdon gyi rnams //
analyzed: grul bum las byung gdon gyi rnams //
translated: the host of spirits arisen from the kumbhāṇḍas,

original: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zhus @35a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zhus @35a * //
translated: This is the request made in the presence of the Sage, the Perfectly Awakened One.

original: pa'o // grul bum gyi ded dpon la sogs pa /
analyzed: pa'o // grul bum gyi ded dpon la sogs pa /
translated: The leaders of the kumbhandas and so forth,

original: rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o //
translated: are led by the noose of the curse of the knowledge mantra.🔽Those who dwell in this southern direction, all of them,

original: lto phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag / mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun //🔽zhes bya ba ni lho phyogs nas glags tshol zhing sems can la gnod pa byed pa rnams //
analyzed: lto phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag / mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun // zhes bya ba ni lho phyogs nas glags tshol zhing sems can la gnod pa byed pa rnams //
translated: are bound by the noose of the sutra.

original: rig pa'i zhags pas bcings pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i zhags pas bcings pa'o //
translated: This is the binding by the noose of knowledge of those who seek an opportunity from the south and harm sentient beings.

original: bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yi //
analyzed: bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yi //
translated: Bound by the five bonds,

original: 'byung po mang po pa la nyon //
analyzed: 'byung po mang po pa la nyon //
translated: listen, many bhutas!

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gti mug la sogs pa de de'i bsdams pas bcings pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gti mug la sogs pa de de'i bsdams pas bcings pa ste /
translated: This is the binding by the five wisdoms, the nature of delusion and so forth.

original: ma rungs pa'i gdon la sogs pa rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos 'dul ba'o ;
analyzed: ma rungs pa'i gdon la sogs pa rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos 'dul ba'o ;
translated: The unruly demons and so forth are subdued by the great king Virudhaka.

original: ; thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //
analyzed: ; thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //
translated: The Sage, the twenty-eight bhutas,

original: klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams //
analyzed: klu las gdon du gyur pa rnams //

original: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pa /

original: klu'i ded dpon du gyur pa /
analyzed: klu'i ded dpon du gyur pa /
translated: He was the leader of the nagas.

original: nub ngos na 'khod pa'o //
analyzed: nub ngos na 'khod pa'o //
translated: He was seated on the west side.

original: nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag //
analyzed: nub phyogs cha 'dir 'khod pa dag //
translated: Those who are seated in this western direction,🔽all of them,

analyzed: mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun // zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i klu dang sa bdag la sogs pa /

analyzed: rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas bcings pa'o //

original: bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yi //
analyzed: bcing pa lnga yis bsdams pa yi //
translated: Bound by the five bonds,

original: 'byung po mang po nga la nyon //
analyzed: 'byung po mang po nga la nyon //

original: zhes bya ba ni nub ngos nas glags tshol zhing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nub ngos nas glags tshol zhing /

analyzed: sems can rnams la gnod pa ste //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis bcings pa bsdams nas //

analyzed: thub pa 'byung po nyi shu brgyad //

analyzed: gnod sbyin las ni gnod gyur pa //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thub pa ni sangs rgyas la zhus pas te /

analyzed: gnon sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams byang ngos na gnas pa'o //

analyzed: byang phyogs cha 'dir 'khor pa dag / mdo sde'i zhags pas de dag kun //

analyzed: mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bsdams pa /

original: gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams //
analyzed: gnod sbyin bye ba drug cu rnams //
translated: who stand before him,

original: zhes bya ba ni bu de'i 'khor ded dpon sde bo che rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bu de'i 'khor ded dpon sde bo che rnams so //
translated: are the great leaders of his retinue.

original: bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas //
analyzed: bcing ba rnam pa lngas bsdams nas //

analyzed: mdo sde'i zhags pas kun du drangs //
translated: they are dragged along by the snares of the sūtras.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyang ye shes lngas bsdams shing /

original: rig sngags kyi zhags pas bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: rig sngags kyi zhags pas bsdams pa'o //

original: dbang phyug chen po lha chen po //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po lha chen po //
translated: Maheśvara, the great god,

original: lag bzhi pa la stobs po che ;🔽; zhes bya ba ni g-yas gnyis na tri sh'u la dang / bum pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
analyzed: lag bzhi pa la stobs po che ; ; zhes bya ba ni g-yas gnyis na tri sh'u la dang / bum pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
translated: has four arms and is Mahābala.🔽He holds a trident and a water pot in his two right hands,

original: g-yon gnyis na phreng ba dad mchod sbyin mdzad pa /
analyzed: g-yon gnyis na phreng ba dad mchod sbyin mdzad pa /
