analyzed: thugs zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sems mi 'phro ba lta bu'o //
translated: for example, like a mind that does not scatter.🔽Subdued faculties means

original: dbang po dul ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs @52a * //
analyzed: dbang po dul ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs @52a * //
translated: free from form,

original: sgra dri ro reg bya dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: sgra dri ro reg bya dang bral ba'o //
translated: sound, smell, taste, and touch.

original: thugs dul bzhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thugs dul bzhes bya ba ni /
translated: Subdued mind means

original: brnab sems gnod sems log par lta ba las bral ba'o //
analyzed: brnab sems gnod sems log par lta ba las bral ba'o //
translated: He is free from covetousness, malice, and wrong views.

original: dul ba dang zhi gnas kyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dul ba dang zhi gnas kyis zhes pa ni /
translated: He is disciplined and tranquil.

original: nyan thos kyi tshul du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi tshul du gnas pa'o //
translated: He abides in the way of the disciples.

original: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He has attained the perfection of the holy.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste de la sbyin pa ni sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin pa ste de la yang gsum /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ste de la sbyin pa ni sems can rnams yongs su 'dzin pa ste de la yang gsum /
translated: The perfections are ten in number. Generosity is the means of attracting sentient beings. It is threefold:

original: zas skom dang nor bu dang / 'bru la sogs pas sems can rnams tshim par byas te /
analyzed: zas skom dang nor bu dang / 'bru la sogs pas sems can rnams tshim par byas te /
translated: By satisfying sentient beings with food, drink, jewels, grain, and so forth, one delights them.

original: mgu bar byed pa dang / phan skyabs dang dbung gnyen gyis sems can rnams 'jigs skrag las dbugs phyung ste mgu bar byed pa dang don dang yi ge dang brda'i sgo nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las grol bar byas te mgu bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mgu bar byed pa dang / phan skyabs dang dbung gnyen gyis sems can rnams 'jigs skrag las dbugs phyung ste mgu bar byed pa dang don dang yi ge dang brda'i sgo nas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las grol bar byas te mgu bar byed pa'o //
translated: By providing protection, refuge, and assistance, one delights them by relieving their fears. And by means of the meaning, the words, and the symbols, one delights them by liberating them from their afflictions.

original: tshul khrims ni de dag la mi gnod cing phan par sems pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims ni de dag la mi gnod cing phan par sems pa ste /
translated: Morality is the intention to benefit and not to harm those beings.

original: de la gsum bcas pa dang rang bzhin gtso bo'i sgo nas gzhan las gnad pa las ldog par dam bcas pa'i sems can thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa'i sgo nas dka' bar byed pa'i dam bcas pa'i sems bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed par dam bcas pa'i sems brtan pa'o //
analyzed: de la gsum bcas pa dang rang bzhin gtso bo'i sgo nas gzhan las gnad pa las ldog par dam bcas pa'i sems can thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs pa'i sgo nas dka' bar byed pa'i dam bcas pa'i sems bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pas sems can gyi don byed par dam bcas pa'i sems brtan pa'o //
translated: The latter is threefold: the mind that is committed to the reversal of the other's commitments by way of the three, the nature, and the principal, all sentient beings, and the firm mind that is committed to the performance of the aim of sentient beings by way of the four means of gathering disciples, etc.

original: bzod pa ni bsran bya'i dngos po la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa sems pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa ni bsran bya'i dngos po la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa sems pa'o //
translated: Patience is the thought of not being afraid of the thing to be endured and of being patient.

original: de la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste /
translated: It is also threefold:

original: chos la sems pa'i phyir rtag tu sdug bsngal ba la sran tshugs pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'i shes pa dang chos nyid stong pa nyid spros bral don la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'o//
analyzed: chos la sems pa'i phyir rtag tu sdug bsngal ba la sran tshugs pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'i shes pa dang chos nyid stong pa nyid spros bral don la mi skrag cing sran tshugs pa'o//
translated: the patience of being patient with constant suffering because of the thought of the Dharma, the knowledge of not being afraid of and being patient with the harm done by others, and the patience of not being afraid of and being patient with the reality of emptiness free from conceptual elaborations.

original: brtson 'grus ni dge ba la spro ba'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni dge ba la spro ba'i shes pa'o //
translated: Exertion is the knowledge of delighting in virtue.

original: de la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste /
translated: It is also threefold:

original: bsgrub bya'i dngos po de ltar sgrub par dam bcas pa'i sems pa dang / de nyid nyams su len pa'i sems pa dang / bsgrub bya de nyid mthar ma phyin par mi gtong ba'i sems pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i dngos po de ltar sgrub par dam bcas pa'i sems pa dang / de nyid nyams su len pa'i sems pa dang / bsgrub bya de nyid mthar ma phyin par mi gtong ba'i sems pa'o //
translated: The intention not to give up the thing to be accomplished until it is finished.

original: bsam gtan ni dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: Concentration is the one-pointedness on the object.

original: de la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of that:🔽When there is no actual laxity or excitement, which are discordant classes, and there is also no fear of them, one should continuously place the mind in evenness.

original: mi mthun phyogs kyi bying rgod dngos por yang ma byung la dogs pa yang yod pa'i tshe spong ba'i sems mnyam pa nyid la rgyun du gzhag / blan te bzhag pa'i sgo nas mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs kyi bying rgod dngos por yang ma byung la dogs pa yang yod pa'i tshe spong ba'i sems mnyam pa nyid la rgyun du gzhag / blan te bzhag pa'i sgo nas mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can sgrub pa dang /
translated: Through the door of the placement of the mind, one should accomplish the special qualities such as the superknowledges.

original: @52b bying rgod byang gi dogs pa yang yod kyang /
analyzed: @52b bying rgod byang gi dogs pa yang yod kyang /
translated: When there is fear of laxity and excitement,

original: dngos su ma byung ba'i sems rnal du zhugs pa'i skabs dang / bying rgod sems byung yang ma byung gi dogs pa yang med pa'i sems lhun gyis grub pa'i skabs na lus kyi 'byor ba stod nas me byung smad nas chu brub pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos su ma byung ba'i sems rnal du zhugs pa'i skabs dang / bying rgod sems byung yang ma byung gi dogs pa yang med pa'i sems lhun gyis grub pa'i skabs na lus kyi 'byor ba stod nas me byung smad nas chu brub pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don byed pa'o //
translated: The actualization of the mind in its natural state, and the spontaneous presence of the mind, without the fear that laxity and excitement might arise, are the times when one benefits beings by the physical perfections, such as fire coming out of the upper part of the body and water out of the lower part.

original: shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is the thorough differentiation of phenomena.

original: de la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste /
translated: It is threefold:

original: sgra thos nas rtogs pa dang / rig pa nges pa'i shes rab kyis sgra don la spyad pas don rtogs pa de lta bu'i don bsgoms pas blo phul du byung ba skyes pa'o //
analyzed: sgra thos nas rtogs pa dang / rig pa nges pa'i shes rab kyis sgra don la spyad pas don rtogs pa de lta bu'i don bsgoms pas blo phul du byung ba skyes pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of hearing, which is the understanding of the meaning through the study of the scriptures; the wisdom of reflection, which is the understanding of the meaning through the study of the treatises; and the wisdom of practice, which is the understanding of the meaning through the practice of the path.

original: thabs ni dge ba chung du byas pa yang mi zad par chen por byed pa ste /
analyzed: thabs ni dge ba chung du byas pa yang mi zad par chen por byed pa ste /
translated: Skill in means is the transformation of even a small wholesome action into a great and inexhaustible one.

original: rang gi skyon dge ba chen po chung dur 'gro ba dang / mi zad pa zad bar 'gyur ba spong ba dang rang gi dge ba la sems 'jug pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu myur du smin pa'i thabs shes pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi skyon dge ba chen po chung dur 'gro ba dang / mi zad pa zad bar 'gyur ba spong ba dang rang gi dge ba la sems 'jug pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu myur du smin pa'i thabs shes pa'o //
translated: It is the means of reducing one's own faults and great virtues to small ones, of abandoning what is inexhaustible, of knowing the means of engaging one's mind in one's own virtue, and of knowing the means of quickly ripening the fruit of one's own virtue.

original: smon lam ni 'dod pa'i gnas su rang gi dge ba stobs pa'o //
analyzed: smon lam ni 'dod pa'i gnas su rang gi dge ba stobs pa'o //
translated: Aspiration is the dedication of one's own virtue to the place one desires.

original: de la yang gsum ste /🔽rang gi dge ba de phyi ma la sogs pa la rgyun mi 'chad par smon cing de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang / bdag gang du skye ba der sems can rnams 'dod chags med ba zhe sdang med par gyur cig ces sems sbyong ba dang bdag gang du skye ba der ma btab pa'i lo thog skye ba sman dang me tog phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste / rang gi dge ba de phyi ma la sogs pa la rgyun mi 'chad par smon cing de yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang / bdag gang du skye ba der sems can rnams 'dod chags med ba zhe sdang med par gyur cig ces sems sbyong ba dang bdag gang du skye ba der ma btab pa'i lo thog skye ba sman dang me tog phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa
translated: It is threefold:

original: thob par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab pa'o //
analyzed: thob par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab pa'o //
translated: Aspiring to one's own virtue in the future, etc., without interruption, and dedicating it for the sake of all sentient beings; purifying one's mind by aspiring, wherever one is born, that sentient beings become free from attachment and free from aversion; and making aspirations, wherever one is born, to obtain a pure realm with abundant harvests, medicines, and flowers, without planting.

original: stobs ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: stobs ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: Power is the subduing of the opposing side.

original: de la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of that:

original: mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang du mi 'gro zhing zil gyis gnon par mi nus shing phar la zil gyis gnon pa dang / bdud dang rgol ba rnams kyis tshur zil gyis gnon par mi nus la phar zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang du mi 'gro zhing zil gyis gnon par mi nus shing phar la zil gyis gnon pa dang / bdud dang rgol ba rnams kyis tshur zil gyis gnon par mi nus la phar zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: One does not go under the sway of nonvirtuous karma, and one is able to subdue it and subdue the other side.

original: ye shes ni dngos po de shes pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni dngos po de shes pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is the knowledge of that entity.

original: de la yang gsum ste /
analyzed: de la yang gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of that:🔽One does not appear as dualistic appearances, but one is not attached to nonappearance.

original: gnyis su snang yang mi snang la zhen pa med pa dang snang ni snang la zhen pa med pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa gang gis 'dul ba dang / de dang der ston pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su snang yang mi snang la zhen pa med pa dang snang ni snang la zhen pa med pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa gang gis 'dul ba dang / de dang der ston pa'o //
translated: One appears as appearances, but one is not attached to appearances.🔽One teaches to those who are to be disciplined by sravakas and so on, and one teaches in that and that way.

original: de ltar bcu po de rnams re re la yang gnyis gnyis te /
analyzed: de ltar bcu po de rnams re re la yang gnyis gnyis te /
translated: Thus, each of those ten has two kinds:

original: sbyin pa yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa dang sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o //🔽de @53a * //
analyzed: sbyin pa yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa dang sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o //🔽de @53a * //
translated: There is giving that is not a perfection, and there is giving that is a perfection.

original: yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zin pa dang / bla na med pa'i rgyur bsdos pa de ni /🔽sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yang sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zin pa dang / bla na med pa'i rgyur bsdos pa de ni / sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa yang yin pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is generosity and a perfection if it is dedicated to the welfare of all sentient beings, if it is embraced by the yoga of loving kindness and compassion, and if it is directed to the cause of unsurpassed enlightenment.🔽It is generosity but not a perfection if it is not embraced by the wisdom that does not focus on the gift, the giver, or the recipient.

original: de las bzlog pa ni sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is generosity but not a perfection if it is not embraced by the wisdom that does not focus on the gift, the giver, or the recipient.

original: de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied to morality and so on.

original: sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: sbyin pa yang yin la pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa la gnyis te /
translated: There are two types of generosity that is not a perfection:

original: sbyin bya'i rdzas la sems pa mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin bdag mi dmigs pa dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis zin pa ni lo ka las 'das pa g-yeng ba las 'phags pa'i phyir 'das pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin bya'i rdzas la sems pa mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin bdag mi dmigs pa dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyis zin pa ni lo ka las 'das pa g-yeng ba las 'phags pa'i phyir 'das pa'o //
translated: Generosity that is not a perfection is embraced by the wisdom that does not focus on the gift, the giver, or the recipient. It is supramundane because it transcends the mundane, and it is transcendent because it transcends distraction.

original: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni lo ka las mi g-yo ba 'phags pa'i phyir na 'jig rten pa'i de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ni lo ka las mi g-yo ba 'phags pa'i phyir na 'jig rten pa'i de ltar tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang sbyar ro //
translated: The complete purity of the three spheres is the transcendence of the world, because it does not move from the world.

original: nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin pa nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin par byed pa'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin pa nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin par byed pa'i phyir na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: The etymology of the perfections is that they are perfections because they cause one to go beyond by means of giving and so on.

original: gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //🔽ming gi rnam grangs pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni mchog tu phyin pa zhes bya /
analyzed: gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o // ming gi rnam grangs pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni mchog tu phyin pa zhes bya /
translated: This should be applied to the others as well.

original: mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The synonyms for the perfections are that they are called perfections, they are called supreme goers and they are called ultimate goers.

original: 'o na 'bras bu sku gsum mam chos kyi dbyings ye shes dang rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis tha dad du mi 'gyur ram zhe na /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni chos can la chos dbyings ye shes sam sku gsum ni chos nyid kyi tshul du gnas pa'am /
analyzed: 'o na 'bras bu sku gsum mam chos kyi dbyings ye shes dang rgyu pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis tha dad du mi 'gyur ram zhe na / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni chos can la chos dbyings ye shes sam sku gsum ni chos nyid kyi tshul du gnas pa'am /
translated: Well, if the result is the three bodies or the expanse of reality and the cause is the perfections, are not the perfections and the result different?

original: chos dbyings ye shes ni rten la /
analyzed: chos dbyings ye shes ni rten la /
translated: The ten perfections are the phenomena possessing attributes and the gnosis of the expanse of reality or the three bodies are the ultimate mode of being or the gnosis of the expanse of reality is the support and the three bodies are the supported.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa ni brten pa'i tshul du gnas pa tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa ni brten pa'i tshul du gnas pa tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: The perfections are the basis, and the way of abiding is non-different.

original: dbang po dben zhing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbang po dben zhing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The faculties are secluded.

original: dbang po ni mig gi dbang po'o //
analyzed: dbang po ni mig gi dbang po'o //
translated: The faculties are the eye faculty, etc.

original: yang na ni gom pa bdun gyi bar du spyi lta ste /
analyzed: yang na ni gom pa bdun gyi bar du spyi lta ste /
translated: Or else, up to seven steps, he looks around.

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: He is absorbed in samādhi.

original: khugs pa zhes bya ba ni sems yin te /
analyzed: khugs pa zhes bya ba ni sems yin te /
translated: He is self-controlled, meaning his mind is controlled.

original: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa yang dag par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa yang dag par spangs pa'o //
translated: He has abandoned afflictions, etc.

original: glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: glang po che ltar shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is well-tamed like an elephant.

original: glang po che ni dpe yin te glang po che dul ba ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzugs la sogs pa 'dul ba'o //
analyzed: glang po che ni dpe yin te glang po che dul ba ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gzugs la sogs pa 'dul ba'o //
translated: An elephant is the example. Just as a tamed elephant is controlled in form, etc., the Perfectly Awakened One is also controlled in form, etc.

original: mtsho ltar dang zhing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtsho ltar dang zhing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is clear like a lake.

original: mtsho ni shin tu rgya che ba gting ring ba ste /
analyzed: mtsho ni shin tu rgya che ba gting ring ba ste /
translated: A lake is very vast and deep.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The qualities of the Perfectly Awakened One are also immeasurable.

original: rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He is free from turbidity.

original: rnyog pa ni dri mas te dri ma ni nyon @53b mongs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnyog pa ni dri mas te dri ma ni nyon @53b mongs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Turbidity” is a stain, and the stain is the afflictions and so forth.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: The perfect Buddha is free from stains.

original: rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Clear” means

original: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnam par gsal ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa rnam par gsal ba ste /
translated: clear in samādhi and so forth,

original: yang na ni ye shes lnga rnam par gsal ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ni ye shes lnga rnam par gsal ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: or endowed with the clarity of the five gnoses.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The body is well adorned with the thirty-two marks of a great being” means

original: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: what are the thirty-two marks?🔽The hands and feet have the marks of wheels,

original: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang ; sor mo ring ba dang /
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang ; sor mo ring ba dang /
translated: the feet are well placed, the hands and feet are connected by webs, the hands and feet are youthful and soft, there are seven prominent places, the fingers are long,

original: rting pa yangs ba dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang /🔽gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang / phrag ba'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang /
analyzed: rting pa yangs ba dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stong lta bu dang / phrag ba'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang /
translated: His heels are broad, his body is large and straight, his feet are well raised, the hairs on his body point upward, his shanks are like those of the enaya deer, his hands reach his knees when he stretches,🔽his sexual organ is concealed in a sheath, his skin is golden colored, his skin is very smooth, each of his body hairs points upward, his face is adorned with a tuft of hair, his shoulders are like those of a lion, the flesh between his shoulders is well developed,

original: phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab ba dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang /
analyzed: phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab ba dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang /
translated: his shoulders are very broad, he has the most excellent taste, his body is tapered like a nyagrodha tree, he has a crown protrusion, his tongue is very broad, he has a melodious voice like Brahma, his jaws are like those of a lion,

original: tshems shin tu dka' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang pa dang / spyan dkar nag phyed pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: tshems shin tu dka' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang pa dang / spyan dkar nag phyed pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste /
translated: His teeth are very white, even, well-aligned, and complete with forty. His eyes are deep blue, and his eyelashes are like those of a magnificent heifer.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ltar /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ltar /
translated: The palms of his hands and the soles of his feet are marked with wheels having a thousand spokes, with rims and hubs, complete in every respect.

original: rus pa'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rus pa'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
translated: His hands and feet are marked with wheels, like the carving on bone or ivory.

original: zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa me dpas zhabs shin tu gnas so //
analyzed: zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa me dpas zhabs shin tu gnas so //
translated: He places his two feet evenly on the ground, and his feet are well-planted because they do not sink down or get stuck.

original: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas /
analyzed: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas /
translated: His fingers and toes are connected by webs, like those of a royal goose.

original: phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o //
translated: His hands and feet are marked with webs.

original: shing bal gyi @54a * //
analyzed: shing bal gyi @54a * //
translated: His ankles are not prominent, like

original: g-yeng bu ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o //🔽zhabs dang phyag dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas /
analyzed: g-yeng bu ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o // zhabs dang phyag dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas /
translated: His hands and feet are soft and tender like those of a Kurara bird, because he is extremely gentle and youthful.🔽His hands, feet, and neck are long,

original: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba'o //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba'o //
translated: because his fingers, toes, and neck are long.🔽His heels are broad,

original: rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o //
analyzed: rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o //
translated: because his heels are long.🔽His body is large and straight,

original: sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o //
analyzed: sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o //
translated: because his body is straight and upright.

original: pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas /
analyzed: pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas /
translated: His ankles are well-rounded,

original: zhabs legs bar mtho ba'o //
analyzed: zhabs legs bar mtho ba'o //
translated: because his ankles are well-rounded.🔽The hairs on his body grow upwards and to the right,

original: spu gyen du g-yas phyogs su 'khyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o //
analyzed: spu gyen du g-yas phyogs su 'khyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o //
translated: because the hairs on his body grow upwards and to the right.🔽His calves are like those of the Ena deer,

original: ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / smin ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyam pa la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / smin ma dang ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyam pa la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o //
translated: because his calves are round and well-proportioned, like those of the Ena deer.

original: brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga la reg pas /
analyzed: brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga la reg pas /
translated: The thighs are straight and not bent, and the palms of the hands touch the right knee.🔽

original: phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o //🔽glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas /
analyzed: phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o // glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas /
translated: His hands reach down to his knees without bending, with his thighs straight, and his palms touch his knees.

original: gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o //
translated: His secret organ is completely covered in a sheath, like that of a horse or elephant, and is very beautiful.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go //
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go //
translated: His skin is the color of pure gold.

original: gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i kha dog tu 'dug bsku la rdul gyis ma gos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o ;
analyzed: gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i kha dog tu 'dug bsku la rdul gyis ma gos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o ;
translated: His skin is smooth, like pure gold or silver, and has a uniform color. His body is unsoiled by dust or dirt.

original: ; shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re re skyes shing /
analyzed: ; shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re re skyes shing /
translated: His body hair is very fine and grows singly.

original: gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o //
translated: It grows in an upward direction, not mixed up.

original: me tog kunda dang zla ba dang 'o ma dang ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la /
analyzed: me tog kunda dang zla ba dang 'o ma dang ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la /
translated: He has the color of jasmine flowers, the moon, milk, or snow.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba rgyas pas kyang 'phags pas 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu rgyas pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba rgyas pas kyang 'phags pas 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu rgyas pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o //
translated: His forehead is broad, because he is superior even to the sun and moon.

original: ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do //🔽mgul pa rgyu legs par lhu 'brel zhing lhun zlum pas /🔽phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o //
analyzed: ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stod do // mgul pa rgyu legs par lhu 'brel zhing lhun zlum pas / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o //
translated: His chest is broad, like that of a lion.🔽His neck is well-proportioned, and his throat is round.🔽His shoulders are well-rounded.

original: gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar shin tu phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar shin tu phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o //
translated: His collarbones are not prominent, because his shoulders are well-developed.

original: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go //
translated: His tongue is the best of all, because it is not damaged by wind, bile, or phlegm, and because it is incomparable.

original: sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas /
analyzed: sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas /
translated: His body is the same width as it is tall,

original: shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o //
analyzed: shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o //
translated: like the banyan tree.

original: spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs par g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub pa la /
analyzed: spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs par g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub pa la /
translated: His head is round, well-proportioned, and curls to the right. His head is well-formed.

original: @54b mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: @54b mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has a crown protrusion on his head because he is beautiful.

original: me tog autpala dmar po'i 'od mnga' ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o //
analyzed: me tog autpala dmar po'i 'od mnga' ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o //
translated: He has a broad and thin tongue because it is very broad and has the color of the light of a red utpala flower.

original: tshangs pa dang bya ka la pingka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so //
analyzed: tshangs pa dang bya ka la pingka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so //
translated: He has a melodious voice like Brahma and the kalaviṅka bird because he has a voice like Brahma.

original: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing /🔽mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing / mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o //
translated: His cheeks are well formed like the surface of a mirror.🔽He has the jaws of a lion because they are well formed and beautiful.

original: me tog kunda dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o //
analyzed: me tog kunda dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o //
translated: He has very white teeth because they are very white like jasmine and conch shell.

original: tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o//🔽tshems la bar mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang pa'o //
analyzed: tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems la bar mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang pa'o //
translated: He has even teeth because his teeth are not high or low.🔽He has teeth without gaps because there are no gaps between his teeth.

original: bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o //
analyzed: bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o //
translated: He has forty even teeth because his teeth are not crooked.

original: dkar nag cha ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mdog dmar pos ma g-yogs pas /
analyzed: dkar nag cha ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mdog dmar pos ma g-yogs pas /
translated: His eyes are not covered with a red color that is not mixed with white and black parts, but is very pure.

original: spyan dkar nag phyed pa'o //
analyzed: spyan dkar nag phyed pa'o //
translated: His eyes are black and white.

original: rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o //
translated: His eyelashes are like those of a magnificent cow, not tangled, with the upper and lower eyelashes well-placed.

original: de la bla ma la bsu skyel dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su sgrub pa la sogs pa la phu dung byas pas /
analyzed: de la bla ma la bsu skyel dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su sgrub pa la sogs pa la phu dung byas pas /
translated: With regard to that, by welcoming and seeing off the guru, by sitting to listen to the dharma, and by following the practice of the monastery and the stupa, and so forth,

original: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste /
translated: his hands and feet have the marks of wheels.

original: de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: That is a sign of having a very large retinue.

original: yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste de ni mi g-yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste de ni mi g-yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: By being firm in one's commitments, one's feet are very well-placed. That is a sign of being unmoving and very firm.

original: sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas zhabs dang phyag dra bas 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas zhabs dang phyag dra bas 'brel ba ste /
translated: By being accustomed to the four types of magnetizing—generosity, pleasant speech, purposeful activity, and having the same purpose—one has hands and feet that are webbed.

original: de ni myur du 'du ba'i lnga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni myur du 'du ba'i lnga ltas so //
translated: These are the five signs of a swift assembly.

original: bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhi ma zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste de gnyis ni bca' ba dang bza' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba mthong ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhi ma zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste de gnyis ni bca' ba dang bza' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba mthong ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: By giving food, drink, and edibles that are not coarse and are pleasant to the touch, one obtains hands and feet that are soft and youthful, and seven convex surfaces. These two are the signs of seeing delicious and pleasant food, drink, and edibles.

original: bcing ba bkrol ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang bas te de ni sku tshe ring pa'i snga ltas so //🔽dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / gzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong @55a * //
analyzed: bcing ba bkrol ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang bas te de ni sku tshe ring pa'i snga ltas so // dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / gzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong @55a * //
translated: By releasing those who are bound, by saving lives, and by abandoning killing, one obtains long fingers, broad heels, and a large and straight body. These are the signs of a long life.

original: mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: By taking up virtuous dharmas, by increasing and not diminishing what is to be upheld, one obtains feet with prominent heels and body hairs that point upward. These are the signs of being endowed with unequalled dharmas.

original: rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan 'byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas /
analyzed: rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan 'byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas /
translated: He honored the arts and crafts and taught them to others.

original: ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: ri dags ae na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste /
translated: He took up the arts and crafts himself.

original: de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: These are the signs of his swift grasp.

original: bdog cing yod pa'i nor blangs nas mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste /
analyzed: bdog cing yod pa'i nor blangs nas mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste /
translated: He gave away his possessions without being stingy. He did not say “I have nothing.”

original: de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang 'dul ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang 'dul ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: These are the signs of his mastery of resources and his training.

original: grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste /
analyzed: grogs po dang / mdza' bshes dang gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste /
translated: He did not divide his friends, relatives, and family. He encouraged beings who were divided to be harmonious. He guarded the secrets of others.

original: de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: These are the signs of his having many sons.

original: stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gzhal med khang bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang // mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste /
analyzed: stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gzhal med khang bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang // mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste /
translated: By giving seats, clothes, houses, palaces, and excellent mansions, he obtained the color of gold and a very soft complexion.

original: de gnyis ni na bza' dang / gdan dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de gnyis ni na bza' dang / gdan dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: These two are the signs of obtaining excellent clothes, seats, houses, palaces, and dwellings.

original: 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: By avoiding distractions, and by serving teachers, preceptors, parents, brothers, and so on,

original: tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang bcol ba rna ba la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang bcol ba rna ba la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste /
translated: and by being respectful, attentive, and not annoying to the ear, he obtained the curl between the eyebrows and the urna on the face.

original: de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: These are the signs of being unequaled.

original: mi snyan pa zer zhing mi smon pa dang / snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste /
analyzed: mi snyan pa zer zhing mi smon pa dang / snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste /
translated: The lion-like upper body is the result of praising others and not speaking unpleasantly of them, and of speaking pleasantly and agreeing with good explanations.

original: de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: The beautiful shoulders are the result of not being able to be defeated.

original: na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim gro dang / sman pa dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste /
analyzed: na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim gro dang / sman pa dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste /
translated: The broad chest and the supreme taste are the result of giving medicine, service, doctors, and nourishing food to the sick, and of serving them.

original: de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: The few illnesses are the result of that.

original: skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / ltung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gzugs lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pa ste /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / ltung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gzugs lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pa ste /
translated: The handsomeness is the result of giving parks, retinues, ponds, difficult-to-cross bridges, food, garland-houses, stairs, and temples, and so forth, to others, and of having others do them first and oneself do them last.

original: @55b shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: @55b shing n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu'i spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste /
translated: His body is like a nyagrodha tree, with its height equal to its width, and with a crown protrusion on his head.

original: de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: These are the signs of his great sovereignty.

original: yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde pa'i smra ba smras pas ljags shin tu srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde pa'i smra ba smras pas ljags shin tu srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so //
translated: He has a very slender tongue and a Brahma-like voice, because for a long time he spoke pleasant, gentle, and soothing words. These two are the signs of his having a voice endowed with five qualities.

original: gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes pa ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /
analyzed: gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes pa ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /
translated: A voice endowed with five qualities is one that is completely understood and comprehended, that is pleasant to hear and free from discord, that is profound and resonant, that is not faint and is pleasing to the ear,

original: ma 'khrugs shing btsal ba'o //🔽yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal ba spangs shing /
analyzed: ma 'khrugs shing btsal ba'o // yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal ba spangs shing /
translated: and that is not agitated and is clear.🔽For a long time he abandoned idle talk and spoke at the appropriate time.

original: dus su smras pas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dus su smras pas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste /
translated: Therefore, he has jaws like a lion.

original: de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: This is a sign that he will be listened to by everyone.

original: rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pas gnyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste de 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pas gnyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste de 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: He has very white and even teeth because he has a pure livelihood, free of contempt and flattery. This is a sign that his retinue will be gathered from before.

original: yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med ba'i tshig smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med ba'i tshig smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: He has forty even teeth because he speaks words that are true and non-divisive for a long time. This is a sign that his retinue will be inseparable.

original: pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nye bar bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so //
analyzed: pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nye bar bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so //
translated: His eyes are like a cow's eyes and his eyes are dark with white pupils because he looks with eyes that are free of attachment, aversion and ignorance without any hidden agenda. This is a sign of complete beauty.

original: de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
analyzed: de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so /
translated: These are the thirty-two marks of a great being.

original: // / dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben ba ste /
analyzed: // / dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni gang zhe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben ba ste /
translated: What is the Sūtra of the Eighty Excellent and Auspicious Verses?

original: sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa'o //
translated: The nails are the color of copper.

original: gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste /
translated: The mind of the Buddhas is like a loving relative, wishing to benefit and bring happiness to sentient beings.

original: sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin /
analyzed: sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin /
translated: The nails are shiny.

original: rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste /
analyzed: rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste /
translated: The Buddhas have appeared in a high caste and family.

original: sen mo mtho ba yin /
analyzed: sen mo mtho ba yin /
translated: The nails are high.

original: tshul la kha na mtho ba mi mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: tshul la kha na mtho ba mi mnga' ba ste /
translated: The Buddhas have no faults in their conduct.

original: sor mo zlum pa yin no //
analyzed: sor mo zlum pa yin no //
translated: The fingers are round.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste /
translated: The Buddhas have accumulated the roots of virtue.

original: sor mo rgyas pa yin no //
analyzed: sor mo rgyas pa yin no //
translated: The fingers are full.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste /
translated: The Buddhas have gradually accomplished the roots of virtue.

original: sor mo rim gyis grub pa @56a * //
analyzed: sor mo rim gyis grub pa @56a * //
translated: The fingers are gradually formed.

original: gzhon pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhon pa yin no //
translated: The Buddhas are young.

original: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste rtsa mi mngon pa yin no //
analyzed: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste rtsa mi mngon pa yin no //
translated: The Buddhas have completely purified their physical, verbal, and mental actions and livelihood. The veins are not visible.

original: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste /
translated: He is the unknotting of the knots of afflictions.

original: rtsa bar mdud pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsa bar mdud pa med pa yin no //
translated: He is the one without knots at the root.

original: shin tu dben pa'i chos mda' ba ste /
analyzed: shin tu dben pa'i chos mda' ba ste /
translated: He is the one with the Dharma of complete seclusion.

original: long bu mi mngon pa yin no //
analyzed: long bu mi mngon pa yin no //
translated: He is the one with ankles that do not protrude.

original: mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste /
translated: He is the one liberated from all unevenness.

original: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin no //🔽mi'i seng ge ste seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin no // mi'i seng ge ste seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the one with feet that are not uneven.🔽He is the lion among men. He is the one who moves with the gait of a lion.

original: mi'i glang po ste glang po che'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: mi'i glang po ste glang po che'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the elephant among men. He is the one who moves with the gait of an elephant.

original: dad pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste /
analyzed: dad pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste /
translated: He is the king of the faithful. He is the one who moves through the sky.

original: dang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: dang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the one who moves with the gait of the faithful.

original: mi'i khyu mchog ste khyu mchog gi 'gros su bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: mi'i khyu mchog ste khyu mchog gi 'gros su bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the bull among men. He is the one who moves with the gait of a bull.

original: mthun pa'i lam mda' ba ste /
analyzed: mthun pa'i lam mda' ba ste /
translated: He is the one with the path of harmony.

original: g-yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: g-yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the one who moves to the right.

original: lta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: lta na mdzes pa ste mdzes par bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the one who is beautiful to behold. He is the one who moves beautifully.

original: rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste /
translated: He is the one who is always without mental faults.

original: ma yo bar bzhud pa yin no //
analyzed: ma yo bar bzhud pa yin no //
translated: He is the one who moves without wavering.

original: tshul rnam par dag pa yon tan ston pa ste sku shin tu legs pa yin no //🔽sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas te /
analyzed: tshul rnam par dag pa yon tan ston pa ste sku shin tu legs pa yin no // sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas te /
translated: His body is well-proportioned, for he teaches the pure way.

original: sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin no //
analyzed: sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin no //
translated: His body is well-rounded, for he has purified all evil ways.

original: chos rim gyis ston pas te sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin no //
analyzed: chos rim gyis ston pas te sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin no //
translated: His body is well-formed, for he teaches the Dharma gradually.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste /🔽sku shin tu gtsang ba yin no //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste / sku shin tu gtsang ba yin no //
translated: His body is pure, for his body, speech, and mind are pure.🔽His body is smooth, for he is naturally gentle.

original: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan bas te sku shin tu 'jam pa yin no //🔽rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa mnga' ba ste /🔽sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //🔽chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan bas te sku shin tu 'jam pa yin no // rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa mnga' ba ste / sku shin tu rnam par dag pa'o // chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste /
translated: His body is very pure, for he is naturally pure.

original: dpe byad bzang po shin tu rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po shin tu rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: His body is well-proportioned, for he has completed the Dharma and the Vinaya.🔽His body is well-rounded, for he has completed the major marks.

original: yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste sku che zhing mdzes pa yin no //🔽sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste sku che zhing mdzes pa yin no // sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste /
translated: His body is large and beautiful, for he teaches the good and vast qualities.

original: sku legs par mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: sku legs par mnyam pa yin no //
translated: His body is well-proportioned, for he has a mind that is impartial toward all beings.

original: mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste /
analyzed: mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in the most gentle way.

original: sku shin tu gzhon pa yin no //
analyzed: sku shin tu gzhon pa yin no //
translated: His body is very youthful.

original: rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste /
translated: He always has an undepressed mind.

original: sku la zhum pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: sku la zhum pa med pa yin no //
translated: His body is without depression.

original: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste /
translated: He has purified all the roots of nonvirtue.

original: sku shin tu rgyas pa yin no //
analyzed: sku shin tu rgyas pa yin no //
translated: His body is very full.

original: yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin no //
translated: He has destroyed and exhausted the possibility of rebirth. His body is very firm.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nyid lag legs par ston pa ste //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nyid lag legs par ston pa ste //
translated: He teaches the branches and sub-branches of dependent origination well.

original: yan lag dang nying lag gtsang mar mdzes pa yin no //🔽gzigs pa shin tu rnam @56b par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag gtsang mar mdzes pa yin no // gzigs pa shin tu rnam @56b par dag pa ste /
translated: His major and minor body parts are clean and beautiful.🔽His vision is very pure.

original: snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: His vision is clear and pure.

original: tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has disciples who are well-disciplined.

original: phya la zlum pa yin no //
analyzed: phya la zlum pa yin no //
translated: His buttocks are round.

original: 'khor ba'i legs nyes thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i legs nyes thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste /
translated: He has completely purified all the good and bad of cyclic existence.

original: phya la shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: phya la shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has very purified buttocks.

original: nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste /
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste /
translated: He has destroyed the tumor of pride.

original: phyal ma zhum pa yin no //
analyzed: phyal ma zhum pa yin no //
translated: He is not sunken in the middle.

original: chos zad pa rnam par zlog pas te phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin no //
analyzed: chos zad pa rnam par zlog pas te phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin no //
translated: He has turned away from the exhaustion of the Dharma.

original: chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste lte bzab ba yin no //
analyzed: chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste lte bzab ba yin no //
translated: He has realized the profound Dharma.

original: mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has disciples who hold to his teachings.

original: lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin no //🔽slob ma kun la mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste ;
analyzed: lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin no // slob ma kun la mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste ;
translated: His navel is deep.🔽He has a beautiful saṅgha of disciples.

original: kun nas mdzes pa yin no //
analyzed: kun nas mdzes pa yin no //
translated: He is beautiful all over.

original: thugs shin tu gtsang bas te /
analyzed: thugs shin tu gtsang bas te /
translated: He has a very pure mind.

original: sku sbyong ba shin tu gtsang ba yin no //
analyzed: sku sbyong ba shin tu gtsang ba yin no //
translated: His body is very pure.

original: chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has the Dharma and Vinaya that are free from the teaching of the dark side.

original: sku la sme ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: sku la sme ba med pa yin no //
translated: He has no moles on his body.

original: shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pas te /
analyzed: shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pas te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma that leads to lightness like cotton.

original: phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa yin no //
translated: His hands are soft like cotton.

original: rang gi skye bo dang phal ba la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin no //🔽shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi skye bo dang phal ba la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin no // shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pas bzhugs pa ste /
translated: He is loved by his own people and by ordinary people, and so he has the mark of hands with soft lines.

original: phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no //🔽bzod pa'i yangs pa ston pa ste phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin no //
analyzed: phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin no // bzod pa'i yangs pa ston pa ste phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin no //
translated: He is very profound and firm in his abiding, and so he has the mark of deep lines in his hands.🔽He teaches the Dharma with a vast patience, and so he has the mark of long fingers.

original: bslab pa'i gnas ha cang mi ring bar 'char ba ste zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin no //🔽gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du dgye ba ste /
analyzed: bslab pa'i gnas ha cang mi ring bar 'char ba ste zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin no // gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du dgye ba ste /
translated: He teaches the training without going to extremes, and so he has the mark of a face that is not too long.

original: zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan ma yin no //🔽'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul ba ste /
analyzed: zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan ma yin no // 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul ba ste /
translated: He radiates images of himself throughout the world, and so he has the mark of a face that is not marked with moles or birthmarks.

original: ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin no //🔽yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin no // yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste /
translated: He is gentle and patient, and so he has the mark of very soft skin.

original: ljags shin tu srab pa yin no //
analyzed: ljags shin tu srab pa yin no //
translated: He is endowed with a multitude of subtle good qualities, and so he has the mark of very thin skin.

original: byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste /
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste /
translated: The Dharma and Vinaya are difficult to fathom for childish ordinary beings who are attached, and so he has the mark of a hidden male organ.

original: ljags shin tu dmar pa yin no //🔽glang po chen po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus nyes pa mi mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: ljags shin tu dmar pa yin no // glang po chen po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus nyes pa mi mnga' ba ste /
translated: His tongue is very red.🔽He has the voice of a great elephant and the voice of thunder.

original: glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has the voice of a great elephant and the voice of thunder.

original: snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has disciples who speak pleasantly, gently, and agreeably.

original: snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He has a voice that is pleasant, gentle, and agreeable.

original: srid par kun du sbyor ba las 'das te /
analyzed: srid par kun du sbyor ba las 'das te /
translated: He has transcended the fetters of existence.

original: tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin no //
analyzed: tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin no //
translated: His canine teeth are very round.

original: skye bo rno ba rnams 'dus pas te /🔽tshems @57a * //
analyzed: skye bo rno ba rnams 'dus pas te / tshems @57a * //
translated: He has gathered together sharp people.

original: mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has sharp canine teeth.

original: chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste /
analyzed: chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste /
translated: The Dharma and Vinaya are very white.

original: tshems mche ba shin tu dkar pa yin no //
analyzed: tshems mche ba shin tu dkar pa yin no //
translated: He has very white canine teeth.

original: sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste /
translated: He sits on even ground.

original: mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has even canine teeth.

original: rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste /
analyzed: rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste /
translated: He teaches the Dharma of realization in stages.

original: tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol pa yin no //
analyzed: tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol pa yin no //
translated: His canine teeth are gradually tapered.

original: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste /
translated: He is seated on the lofty mountain of wisdom.

original: shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has a well-elevated nose.

original: 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has a pure retinue of disciples.

original: shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin no //
analyzed: shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin no //
translated: His nose is very pure.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste /
translated: He has the most exalted of the qualities of a Buddha.

original: spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin no ;
analyzed: spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin no ;
translated: He has long eyes.

original: ; gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ; gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: His vision is very pure.

original: sban rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: sban rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: His eyelashes are very pure.🔽He has a very large retinue of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste rdzi ma stug pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste rdzi ma stug pa yin no //
translated: His eyebrows are very thick.

original: lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na chung mchog gi mig dkar nag phyed pa padma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas te /
analyzed: lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na chung mchog gi mig dkar nag phyed pa padma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar byas te /
translated: His eyes are very beautiful, with their white and black parts distinct, like the petals of a lotus, to the eyes of the most exalted gods, demigods, and humans.

original: spyan dkar nag phyed cing padma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin no //
analyzed: spyan dkar nag phyed cing padma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin no //
translated: His eyes are long, with their white and black parts distinct, like the petals of a lotus.

original: rtag tu yangs pas gzigs pa ste spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag tu yangs pas gzigs pa ste spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has long eyes, because his vision is always vast.

original: 'jam pa dul ba la mkhas pa ste smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jam pa dul ba la mkhas pa ste smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has smooth eyebrows, because he is skilled in gentleness and discipline.

original: skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste smin ma'i spu mnyan pa dang ldan no //
analyzed: skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste smin ma'i spu mnyan pa dang ldan no //
translated: He has even eyebrows, because he knows all faults.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pas skye bo 'dul ba ste smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pas skye bo 'dul ba ste smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has glossy eyebrows, because his mind is moistened by the oil of the roots of virtue, and he disciplines beings.

original: chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin no //
analyzed: chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin no //
translated: He has beautiful ears and a long neck, because he has the most vast and meaningful Dharma.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las rnam par rgyal ba ste snyan mnyam pa yin no /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rgyu las rnam par rgyal ba ste snyan mnyam pa yin no /
translated: He has even ears, because he has conquered the causes of the afflictions.

original: sems can bsam pa mnyam pa 'bul ba ste snyan gyi dbang po mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no //🔽lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste /
analyzed: sems can bsam pa mnyam pa 'bul ba ste snyan gyi dbang po mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin no // lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste /
translated: He has even sense faculties, because he has equal concern for all beings.🔽He has a broad forehead, because he has abandoned all the signs of the tīrthikas.

original: zhal dbral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhal dbral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has a well-formed forehead, because he has purified all the aspects of views.

original: phas kyi rgol ba shin tu dul ba ste /
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba shin tu dul ba ste /
translated: He is the one who has completely subdued his opponents.

original: zhal dbral ba yangs ba dang ldan pa yin no //🔽smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no //
analyzed: zhal dbral ba yangs ba dang ldan pa yin no // smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin no //
translated: He has a broad forehead.🔽He has fulfilled his excellent aspirations.

original: g-yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste /
analyzed: g-yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste /
translated: He has a head that is as round as a turban.

original: dbu bung ba ltar gang pa yin no //
analyzed: dbu bung ba ltar gang pa yin no //
translated: He has a head that is as round as a bun.

original: mthong ba dang bsgom pa spangs pa'i bag la nyal zad par bya ba ste dbu stug pa yin no //🔽thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs @57b su chud pa ste /
analyzed: mthong ba dang bsgom pa spangs pa'i bag la nyal zad par bya ba ste dbu stug pa yin no // thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs @57b su chud pa ste /
translated: He has destroyed the latent tendencies of the obscurations that are to be abandoned by seeing and by cultivation.

original: dbu 'jam pa yin no //🔽rtag tu mi 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: dbu 'jam pa yin no // rtag tu mi 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste /
translated: He has a head that is thick.🔽He has a head that is smooth because he has understood the essence of the teachings with a gentle mind.🔽He has a head that is unruffled.

original: dbu skra mi 'dzing ba yin no //🔽brlang ba'i gsung yongs su bral ba ste /
analyzed: dbu skra mi 'dzing ba yin no // brlang ba'i gsung yongs su bral ba ste /
translated: He has hair that is not tangled because he has a mind that is always undisturbed.

original: dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin no //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste /
analyzed: dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin no // byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste /
translated: He has hair that is not rough because he is free of harsh speech.

original: dbul dri zhim pa yin no //
analyzed: dbul dri zhim pa yin no //
translated: He has hair that has a pleasant odor because he has accomplished the agreeable state of beings with the flower incense of the factors of awakening.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The Blessed Buddhas are adorned with the auspicious signs of srivatsa, swastika, and srivatsa.

original: shing s'a la'i rgyal po ltar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: shing s'a la'i rgyal po ltar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Like the king of the sala trees,

original: shin tu skye legs pa yal ga mang ba lo ma rgyas pa /
analyzed: shin tu skye legs pa yal ga mang ba lo ma rgyas pa /
translated: it is well-grown, with many branches and luxuriant foliage.

original: dper na dbyar ka tshad pa che ba'i dus su tshad pa la 'jigs nas shing des kyang mi la phan thogs te /
analyzed: dper na dbyar ka tshad pa che ba'i dus su tshad pa la 'jigs nas shing des kyang mi la phan thogs te /
translated: For example, in the summer when there is great heat, fearing the heat, that tree also benefits people.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the same way, the Perfectly Awakened Ones also benefit the beings of the six realms.

original: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: The Tathagata is called thus-gone because he has gone to suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid ni stong pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni stong pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: Suchness is emptiness free from conceptual elaborations.

original: de yang dang po byung yang de'i dang las byung ba /
analyzed: de yang dang po byung yang de'i dang las byung ba /
translated: Moreover, it arises from that in the beginning,

original: bar du gnas kyang der /
analyzed: bar du gnas kyang der /
translated: abides in that in the middle,🔽and

original: tha mar 'gags pa thim yang de la thim pa'i phyir te chos sku'o //
analyzed: tha mar 'gags pa thim yang de la thim pa'i phyir te chos sku'o //
translated: In the end, even though it ceases and dissolves, it dissolves into that, which is the dharmakaya.

original: yang na de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang na de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ste /
translated: Or, it is the realization of suchness.

original: stong pa nyid spros bral rtogs shing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid spros bral rtogs shing /
translated: The realization of emptiness free from conceptual elaborations is the sambhogakaya,

original: rig pa'i phyir longs sku'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i phyir longs sku'o //
translated: because it is awareness.

original: yang de bzhin du gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: yang de bzhin du gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: Or, it is the tathagata because it has gone to suchness.

original: mar me mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don la gshegs pa ste sbrul ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: mar me mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can don la gshegs pa ste sbrul ba'i sku'o //
translated: The buddhas of the three times, such as Dipankara, have gone to the benefit of sentient beings through the twelve deeds and so forth, which is the nirmanakaya.

original: sku rnam par sbras pa zhes bya ba ni shing s'a la'i lo ma rgyas pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yon tan gyis sbras pa'o //
analyzed: sku rnam par sbras pa zhes bya ba ni shing s'a la'i lo ma rgyas pa ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yon tan gyis sbras pa'o //
translated: The buddhas are said to be fully blossomed because the Bhagavan buddhas are fully blossomed with qualities, like the leaves of a sala tree.

original: nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra bas kun du 'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra bas kun du 'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Like the sun, it radiates a net of light rays.

original: 'od zer ni nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer dra ba ste /
analyzed: 'od zer ni nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer dra ba ste /
translated: The light rays are the net of the light rays of seven suns.

original: nyi ma de bzhin du 'od zer khyab pa bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma de bzhin du 'od zer khyab pa bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis khyab pa'o //
translated: Just as the sun pervades with its rays, the perfect, complete Buddha pervades with his splendor.

original: 'od zer ni dra ba kun du 'gyed pa ci'i phyir zhe na don med par dra ba 'gyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'od zer ni dra ba kun du 'gyed pa ci'i phyir zhe na don med par dra ba 'gyed pa ma yin no //
translated: Why does the ray emit a net? It is not without reason that it emits a net.
